metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1813 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.Description: util-linux/mdev.c in BusyBox before 1.21.0 uses 0777 permissions for parent directories when creating nested directories under /dev/, which allows local users to have unknown impact and attack vectors.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> "low" because mdev doesn't easily support nested directories

criterions.comment: busybox package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1').
